articles.title: Woman who was allegedly filmed in the shower at URI is suing the school
articles.description:
The woman alleges URI “placed her in an unusually vulnerable position” through lax safeguards surrounding its unisex bathrooms.

The post Woman who was allegedly filmed in the shower at URI is suing the school appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Woman sues URI for alleged invasion of privacy in unisex bathrooms.
Incident involved lax safeguards, increasing vulnerability for students.
Case raises concerns about bathroom safety for Boston area universities.

articles.title: Christian Gonzalez to miss Patriots’ season opener, Will Campbell questionable vs. Raiders
articles.description:
Gonzalez has been out since July 28th with a hamstring injury.

The post Christian Gonzalez to miss Patriots’ season opener, Will Campbell questionable vs. Raiders appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Christian Gonzalez will miss the Patriots' season opener against the Raiders on September 10.
Gonzalez has been sidelined since July 28 due to a hamstring injury.
Will Campbell's status remains uncertain, impacting the team's defensive lineup.

articles.title: Jayson Tatum’s Celtics teammate has a positive update on star’s recovery from Achilles tear
articles.description:
"He's moving around way better. So, he's progressing well. I'm definitely happy to see him getting back healthy."

The post Jayson Tatum’s Celtics teammate has a positive update on star’s recovery from Achilles tear appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jayson Tatum is recovering well from his Achilles tear, according to teammate Jordan Walsh.
Walsh noted Tatum is moving around significantly better as of September 5, 2025.
Tatum's recovery is crucial for the Celtics' performance in the upcoming NBA season.

articles.title: 5 things to know about the Raiders ahead of Sunday’s matchup against the Patriots
articles.description:
Just like the Patriots, the Raiders are also ushering in a new era at head coach as they hope to get back into playoff contention.

The post 5 things to know about the Raiders ahead of Sunday’s matchup against the Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots face Raiders on Sunday, both teams adjusting to new head coaches.
Raiders aim for playoff contention after a challenging previous season.
Local fans anticipate a competitive matchup impacting playoff dynamics.

articles.title: What does it mean that TreVeyon Henderson is listed 3rd on the Patriots’ depth chart?
articles.description:
As the Week 1 gets closer, the Patriots running back room is still up in the air.

The post What does it mean that TreVeyon Henderson is listed 3rd on the Patriots’ depth chart? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: TreVeyon Henderson is currently listed as the third running back for the Patriots.
The Patriots' running back situation remains uncertain as Week 1 approaches on September 10.
This depth chart positioning may affect game strategy and player performance for Boston fans.
